text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS
119 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
September 24, 1952
Mr. Seymour N. Siegel
President, NAEB
WNYC, Municipal Broadcasting System
2500 Municipal Building
New York 7, N. Y.
Dear Sy:
Welcome homel
I*ve replied to every inquiry, acknowledged
receipt of every order on THE JEFFERSONIAN HERITAGE series.
I*ve enclosed fact sheet and one folder with each letter#
Copy of form letters used also attached.
I trust my fact sheet is accurate, but I had to
get out the information, and it was accurate to the best
of my knowledge. You know, ol* boy, it was all news to
me when I saw my names in the ads.
When you want the compiled dope, including
mailing list, 1*11 tabulate and let you have. When, sir?
When you have more exact data on shipping,
release, etc#, 1*11 get out another fact sheet to all
stations#
Incidentally, Horton report practically in
shape to submit proofs to Horton for checking. Smythe
copy submitted to me by Dallas last Saturday afternoon, and
will be in hopper next week, I hope.
FES:fmh
Enel.
